*To commit the approved changes: **If a sandbox page is the substitute of an already existent page: ***Copy the sandbox wikitext into the old page ***Redirect the sandbox page to the true page ***This way the visits counter in the real page won’t change, otherwise it will go to zero :/ **If a sandbox page has to become a new “real” page: ***Move it to the new destination for example from Meta:Sandbox/Manual/foo to Doc:Manual/foo.

*提交被认可的修改： **如果sandbox页面是已经存在页面替代品的话： ***请把sandbox里面的维基格式文本拷贝到旧的页面 ***重新将sandbox的链接设置到真正的页面 ***这样，真实页面的访问计数器不会被修改，否则它会被清零。 :/ **如果sandbox页面不得不成为一个新的“真正”页面： ***请把它移动到新的目的地，比如从Meta:Sandbox/Manual/foo 移动到 Doc:Manual/foo。

- Split the whole task into smaller, more manageable chunks, loosely modelled after the audio workflow of a feature film production.<br0>
- 拆分成更小，更易于管理的部分，松散建模的，特色电影制作 ，在音频全流程之后。 <br0>
- Work on each of them in isolation until it can stand on its own.<br2>
- 他们中的每个工作独立，直到它能自立。<br2>
- Worry about glueing them together later on.
- 以后再操心如何把它们粘合在一起。

<u1> <i0>PNG</i0> is the default output format but you can choose among many formats.
<u1> <i0>PNG</i0>是默认的输出格式，但是您能改成很多其他的格式。
<u1> <i1>Fresnel:</i1> a parameter related to the behavior of the material that does not reflect equally.
<u1> <i1>Fresnel:</i1>控制材质不反射的参数。

<u1> <i2>New Center</i2>: Moves the center and repositioned without moving the object (this operation should make it in <i3>Object Mode</i3> or otherwise Blender will send an error message telling you) <u2> <i4>Center Cursor</i4>: Move the center and places the cursor is on 3D (this operation should make it in <i5>Object Mode</i5> or otherwise Blender will send an error message telling you)
<u1> <i2>New Center（新的中心）</i2>: 移动中心不移动物体（这个操作应该在<i3>Object Mode</i3>模式操作，否则Blender将报错) <u2> <i4>Center Cursor（以指针为中心）</i4>: 在3D窗口中移动中心，放到指针的位置 (这个操作应该在 <i5>Object Mode</i5>模式操作，否则Blender将报错)
<u1> <i5>Alpha:</i5> The amount of transparency.
<u1> <i5>Alpha:</i5>透明度的大小。
<u1>[-]You can accumulate Transformers 3D viewing if you keep <i0>Shift</i0> pressed.
<u1>[-]如果您在3D视图中，按住 <i0>Shift</i0> 键，你能缓慢的进行变换。
<u2> <i1>BW</i1>, and <i2>RGBA RGBA:</i2> to make the render in black and white, RGB or RGB alpha channel.
<u2> <i1>BW</i1>, 和 <i2>RGBA RGBA:</i2> 把作品渲染成黑白、RGB（红绿蓝三色模式）或RGB alpha channel（具有透明通道的RGB）模式。
<u2> <i2>Energy:</i2> The amount of light.
<u2> <i2>Energy（能量）:</i2>光的亮度。

<u2> <i2>Fade to Material:</i2> non-fading for dye color of the sky (in a while will know this color edit) <u3> <i3>Gloss:</i3> that the reflection is not too clean and seem unreal (unless it is a mirror)
<u2> <i2>Fade to Material:</i2> 不对来自天空的颜色产生Fade（淡出效果）(以后我们还可以再编辑这个颜色) <u3> <i3>Gloss（光泽）:</i3>让反射不是那么明显，来模拟真实效果(镜子除外)
<u2> <i6>IOR:</i6> distortion of objects seen from behind.
<u2> <i6>IOR:</i6>从后面能看到的对象的扭曲度。
<u2>[-]All transformers have a white circle, if you move the cube from her, the transformation will not be on any axis but the monitor.
<u2>[-]所有的转换方式都有个白色的环，如果您把立方体从那个环移走，转换将不会按照任何轴进行，而是在您的显示器里面移动。
<u3> <i7>Gloss:</i7> similar to the treaty in <i8>Mirror</i8>.
<u3> <i7>Gloss:</i7>和<i8>Mirror</i8>里面一样。
<u3>[-]The drop down where it says <i1>Global</i1> can forget the moment.
<u3>[-] <i1>Global</i1>下拉菜单目前先忽略不讲。
<u4>[-]Any change in course may be canceled by <i2>"Esc"</i2> or right mouse button.
<u4>[-]您过程中的任何修改都可以通过按下 <i2>"Esc"</i2>键或者鼠标右键来取消。

== Previous Blender versions tasks ==
== Blender以前版本的代办事项 ==

===How to make big changes=== *After you got a general consensus, put a [[Template:Warning/Working|warning template]] in the page(s) you plan to change to avoid someone will edit a page that is going to change.

===如何做一个大的修改===
*在您达成共识之后, 请在您想修改的页面放置一个[[Template:Warning/Working|警告模板]]，来避免其他人会编辑正在修改的页面。
==How to sign== In order to put your [http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Help:Signatures signature] on a page you can type a series of tilde.
==如何注册== 为了把您的 [http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Help:Signatures 签名]放在页面上，您可以输入一系列的波浪符号。
==Major Edits== ===Show your intentions in the Sandbox=== *Instead of adding new pages right away, prepare them under [[Meta:Sandbox]], then ask for a review in docboard or IRC.

==主要编辑== ===请在Sandbox里面写清您的意图===
*请在[[Meta:Sandbox]]里面准备您的内容，然后请一位docboard或IRC里的朋友来审查，而不是马上添加一个新页面。
==Modeling using DupliFrames== We are going to model a chain with its links using DupliFrames.
==使用DupliFrames建模== 我们讲使用DupliFrames制作一个链子。

=DupliFrames= You can consider DupliFrames in two different ways: an arranging or a modeling tool.
=DupliFrames= 你可以把DupliFrames看作两个用途:一个排列工具，或者一个建模工具。

=Editing rights= ==Anonymous editing== You don’t need to ask for editing rights, we use a Captcha system to verify that editing has been made by humans and not bots, so you can just edit and fill the captcha with the right words after editing, and that’s it.
=编辑权限= ==匿名编辑== 您不必需要修改权，我们采用CAPTCHA系统，来确保编辑是由人做的，而不是机器。所以您只需编辑，然后填写正确的captcha识别码即可。
=Editing workflow= ==Minor Edits== If you noticed a typo, some minor error, anything you can fix in 1 minute or less, just do it!
=编辑工作流程= ==小修改== 如果你发现一个错字，一些小错误，任何您可以在1分钟内完成的问题，立即搞定它！

=General Rules= We welcome localisation of the Core Documents and provide place within the wiki as long as the abide to the following rules: *Localised versions have the same license than the main, Official, English version.
=基本规则= 我们欢迎对核心文档的本地化，并且会在维基保留您的文章，只要您遵守下列规则： *本地化版本同主版本（官方的英文版本）保持同样的许可
=Guidelines= *Please follow the guidelines on [[Meta:Guides/Blender Wiki Structure|naming]] and on [[Meta:Guides/Style Guide|style]].
=指南= *请遵守在 [[Meta:Guides/Blender Wiki Structure|命名]] 和 [[Meta:Guides/Style Guide|风格]]方面的指南。
=Images Names= Use the English images, they usually do '''not''' need to be localised, be kind to our server!
=图片名称= 请直接使用英文图像，他们通常是'''不'''需要进行本地化的，请您善待我们的服务器！
=Links to non-existent pages= If a page doesn’t exist then don’t link it, so that we avoid those awful green- or red-links.
=链接不存在的网页= 如果页面不存在的话就不要链接它，这样我们才能避免这些可怕的绿色或红色的链接。
=Mediawiki syntax= Refer to [http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Help:Contents the official MediaWiki Docs].
=维基语法= 请参考[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Help:Contents 官方维基文档]。

=Page Name= Keep the naming scheme exactly the same as the English pages, and add your language code between the namespace (the small string before the first “:”, like “Doc” in “Doc:Manual/Data System/The Outliner”) and the page name (“Manual/Data System/The Outliner” in our example).
=页面名称= 命名方案请您和英文网页保持完全一样，并在代码之间的命名空间（''the small string before the first''“:”如在Doc:Manual/Data System/The Outliner 中的“Doc”）和网页名称（在我们的例子里是“ Manual/Data System/The Outliner”）添加您的语言代码。
=Technical terms= In general, the technical terms used in CG are quite new or even downright neologisms invented for the needs, so they do not always have a translation in your language.
=科技术语= 通常，在CG方面的科技术语都很新，甚至完全是按照需要造出来的新词,所以这些术语通常不在您的语言里。
